note:
I'm a low vision technology person currently working on accessibility at Google Search, and views here are my own.

I'm an enthusiast of assistive technology, whether or not it's software.

I don't drive, and get everywhere on my bike, by walking, and by taking public transportation. We need to move away from car centricity.

I enjoy playing and listening to many types of music, mostly in the areas of jazz, rock, and electronic. I've also been building a Minecraft world for over 11 years.
